trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Riverton
There was one other sighting in Riverton on or around July 7th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAll I can tell you is that we were at Sacajawea's gravesite and I took a picture of her and her 2 sons headstones. I did not realize that the UFO was in the sky until I got home and saw the photograph. I have sent it to several friends of mine for comment. I have seen one before in Elm Creek, Nebraska in July of 1972, I was with a friend of mine when we saw it. They are real.I am going to try to attach the picture with this report. You be the judge.
Summary: In the picture it appears to be a disc shaped object
